bug.author: RangiLyu
bug.description:
环境: Windows10 VS2019 MSVC 14.27.29110 Protobuf-3.4.0 ncnn commit <denchmark-link:https://github.com/Tencent/ncnn/commit/4463c3b455e921c55a102622849b249d0ad1dd48>4463c3b</denchmark-link>
编译到caffe2ncnn时报错，错误信息如下 <denchmark-code>[ 99%] Building CXX object tools/caffe/CMakeFiles/caffe2ncnn.dir/caffe2ncnn.cpp.obj caffe2ncnn.cpp D:\Programs\ncnn\tools\caffe\caffe2ncnn.cpp(318): error C2660: “google::protobuf::io::CodedInputStream::SetTotalBytesLimit”: 函数不接受 1 个参数 D:\Programs\protobuf-3.4.0\build-vs2019\install\include\google/protobuf/io/coded_stream.h(407): note: 参见“google::protobuf::io::CodedInputStream::SetTotalBytesLimit”的声明 NMAKE : fatal error U1077: “C:\PROGRA~2\MICROS~1\2019\COMMUN~1\VC\Tools\MSVC\1427~1.291\bin\Hostx64\x64\cl.exe”: 返回代码“0x2” Stop. NMAKE : fatal error U1077: “"C:\Program Files (x86)\Microsoft Visual Studio\2019\Community\VC\Tools\MSVC\14.27.29110\bin\HostX64\x64\nmake.exe"”: 返 回代码“0x2” </denchmark-code>

comments.comment:
<denchmark-code>#if GOOGLE_PROTOBUF_VERSION >= 3002000 codedstr.SetTotalBytesLimit(INT_MAX); #else codedstr.SetTotalBytesLimit(INT_MAX, INT_MAX / 2); #endif </denchmark-code>
把这里的判断去了改成codedstr.SetTotalBytesLimit(INT_MAX, INT_MAX / 2)就能编译通过了，同样出问题的还有onnx2ncnn.cpp的43行。应该是commit ecc63a6d52b951986859869b15957728d418a843导致的，是不是这里判断protobuf版本的时候设置错了？
